rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Widely accessible entrance with wheelchair ramps and tactile guidance.

rooms.name: Open-Plan Kitchen & Living Area
rooms.description: Contemporary design with ample counter space, modern cabinetry and energy-efficient appliances. Integrated seating area adheres to open-plan layout. All surfaces wheelchair accessible.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Accessible bedroom with built-in storage and en-suite bathroom connected via a roll-in shower for wheelchair accessibility. Oriented in Vastu auspicious direction (east).

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Comfortable bedroom with built-in furniture and accessible design ensuring ease of movement.

rooms.name: Utility Room / Service Area
rooms.description: Serves as a utility space for laundry and additional storage; designed for accessibility.

openings.description: Seamless connection to the outdoor living and swimming pool area.

additional_features.description: Accessible design with gentle ramp entry for wheelchair users and safety rails.

additional_features.location: surrounding the pool and connecting interior to exterior.

vastu_considerations.detail: The main entrance is oriented towards north or east following Vastu guidelines for prosperity and positive energy flow.
Master bedroom faces east to enhance vitality; living area centrally located to harmonize with the overall design.
